meanings.definition: A type of bird with bright orange and black plumage.
meanings.sent1: The orioles chirped melodiously in the tree.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a pair of orioles building a nest in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The orioles had a playful squabble over a juicy worm.
meanings.sent4: Her scarf resembled the vibrant colors of an orioles' feathers.
meanings.sent5: The orioles' distinctive colors make them easy to identify.

meanings.definition: The professional baseball team based in Baltimore, Maryland.
meanings.sent1: My dad took me to watch the orioles play at the stadium.
meanings.sent2: The orioles won the championship last year.
meanings.sent3: The orioles' mascot danced hilariously between innings.
meanings.sent4: The orioles' victory was as sweet as a summer breeze.
meanings.sent5: Fans cheered loudly for the orioles as they took the field.
